We’re mired in layers of bureaucracy. Vaccines stuck in hospitals. Docs, nurses, pharmacists begging to go into LTC to immunize. The delay costs lives. We’re #ReadyToVaccinate yet 67% of #CovidVaccine in Ontario is unused. @jkwan_md estimates Dec 2030 before we reach our targets!

Ontario has had over 2800 deaths in #LTC facilities from #COVID19. Many people died alone, without basic care, dignity or human contact.  Yet, the government is now delaying & obstructing the work of their own LTC commission.  This is unacceptable.
